products.name: Milk Chocolate Bar
products.categories: Snacks, Sweet snacks, Cocoa and its products, Confectioneries, Bars, Chocolate candies, Chocolates, Milk chocolates, Chocolates with almonds, Milk chocolate bar, Milk chocolate bar with nougat, Milk chocolates with almonds, Swiss chocolates, fr:Chocolats au lait au nougat, fr:Chocolats au nougat
products.packaging: Metal, Cardboard, Container, Sheet, Sleeve, fr:feuille métal et étui carton à recycler
products.facts: ["Made from cocoa solids, sugar, milk powder, and cocoa butter.","Typically contains around 30% cocoa content, ensuring a creamy texture and sweet flavor.","Sustainably sourced cocoa can help reduce deforestation and support local farming communities.","Quality milk chocolate bars often have a smooth melt and rich flavor, indicating higher cocoa and milk content."]

products.name: Organic Apple Cider Vinegar
products.labels: No gluten,Organic,USDA Organic, No GMOs, Non GMO project
products.facts: ["Made from organic apples without synthetic pesticides or herbicides.","Contains beneficial acetic acid and enzymes that promote gut health.","Produced using sustainable farming practices to minimize environmental impact.","Unfiltered and unpasteurized to retain natural nutrients and probiotics."]

products.name: Coconut Water
products.categories: Beverages and beverages preparations,Plant-based foods and beverages,Beverages,Plant-based beverages,Coconut waters
products.labels: No gluten,Vegetarian,No GMOs,Vegan,Certified B Corporation,FSC,FSC Mix,Non GMO project
products.facts: ["Coconut water is 100% natural and contains no added sugars or preservatives.","It is rich in electrolytes, making it a popular choice for hydration and replenishment after exercise.","Coconuts are grown in tropical climates, and their cultivation can help support local economies and sustainable farming practices.","Coconut water packaging often uses eco-friendly materials, and some brands focus on sustainable sourcing to minimize environmental impact."]

products.name: Wholegrain Pilau Microwave Basmati Rice Classics
products.facts: ["Made with 100% wholegrain basmati rice for added fiber and nutrients.","Packaged in recyclable materials to reduce environmental impact.","No artificial additives or preservatives, ensuring a natural product.","Quick cooking time of just 2 minutes in the microwave for convenience."]

products.name: Graham Crackers
products.categories: Snacks,Sweet snacks,Biscuits and cakes,Biscuits and crackers,Biscuits
products.facts: ["Graham crackers are primarily made from whole wheat flour, sugar, and honey.","The packaging is often recyclable, promoting eco-friendly disposal.","Many brands of graham crackers are made without artificial flavors or colors, ensuring a more natural product.","Graham crackers are a good source of carbohydrates, providing energy for various activities."]

products.name: Mac And Cheese Original Flavor
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Cereals and potatoes, Cereals and their products, Meals, Pasta dishes, Pastas, Macaroni and cheese
products.facts: ["Made with real cheese for authentic flavor.","Contains no artificial preservatives or flavors.","Packaging is recyclable, reducing environmental impact.","Quality ingredients ensure a creamy texture and rich taste."]

products.name: Ramen noodle soup chicken flavor
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Cereals and potatoes, Cereals and their products, Meals, Dried products, Pastas, Dried products to be rehydrated, Noodles, Dried meals, Instant noodles, en:soups
products.facts: ["Contains wheat noodles made from enriched flour, salt, and water.","The packaging is often recyclable, contributing to reduced waste.","Typically low in calories, making it a quick meal option.","May contain preservatives and artificial flavors for enhanced taste."]

products.name: 100% Whole Wheat Bread
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Cereals and potatoes, Breads, Sliced breads, White breads, Wheat breads
products.facts: ["Made from 100% whole wheat flour, retaining all parts of the grain for maximum nutrition.","Typically contains no artificial preservatives or additives, promoting a cleaner label.","Whole wheat bread has a lower environmental impact compared to white bread due to less processing.","Rich in dietary fiber, which supports digestive health and contributes to a feeling of fullness."]

products.name: Silken tofu firm
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages,Plant-based foods,Legumes and their products,Meat alternatives,Meat analogues,Tofu
products.labels: No gluten,Vegetarian,No GMOs,No preservatives,Vegan,Green Dot,Non GMO project,The Vegan Society,KSA Parve
products.facts: ["Silken tofu firm is made primarily from soybeans, water, and coagulants such as magnesium chloride or calcium sulfate.","It is a plant-based protein source, making it a sustainable alternative to animal products with a lower carbon footprint.","Silken tofu is often packaged in recyclable materials, contributing to reduced environmental impact.","The quality of silken tofu can be determined by its texture, which should be smooth and creamy, indicating proper processing and freshness."]

products.name: Hershey's Syrup Chocolate
products.categories: Condiments, Specific products, Products for specific diets, Products without gluten, Sauces, Dessert sauces, Chocolate sauce, en:simple-syrups
products.labels: Bajo o sin grasas,Sin gluten,Kosher,Sin colorantes artificiales,Sin grasas,Unión Ortodoxa Kosher
products.facts: ["Made with real cocoa for authentic chocolate flavor.","Contains no high fructose corn syrup, ensuring a more natural taste.","Packaged in a recyclable bottle to reduce environmental impact.","Quality assured through strict manufacturing processes and ingredient sourcing."]

products.name: Organic Creamy Peanut Butter
products.ingredients_text: Dry Roasted Organic Peanuts, Sea Salt
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Legumes and their products, Fats, Spreads, Nuts and their products, Plant-based spreads, Vegetable fats, Oilseed purees, Legume butters, Nut butters, Peanut butters
products.facts: ["Made from organic peanuts without any artificial additives or preservatives.","Sustainably sourced peanuts that support eco-friendly farming practices.","Rich in protein and healthy fats, making it a nutritious choice.","Packaged in recyclable materials to reduce environmental impact."]
